amendment.description: To require a report on the use of social security numbers by the Department of Veterans Affairs and the plans of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to discontinue such use.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2788 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2788 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7880) To require a report on the use of social security numbers by the Department of Veterans Affairs and the plans of the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to discontinue such use.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2788 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2788 proposed by Senator Kirk for Senator Collins to Amendment SA 2763.
